task_background: Prepare the high-security Forensic Research Archive for an upcoming international inspection by organizing, repairing, and securing all evidence and equipment.

tasks.task_description: Place the CONFIDENTIAL Dossier (confidential_dossier_1) on the verification desk (verification_desk_1).
Place the World Inspection Team '91 Coffee Mug (coffee_mug_1) in the sink.
Find the heaviest, brown leather item in the main archive hall and place it on the verification desk.
Find the partially redacted, brown leather dossier and place it in the document authentication room.
Use the UV light wand (uv_light_wand_1) to sterilize the used microscope slide (used_microscope_slide_1).
Find the dusty, brown leather ledger and use the polishing cloth (polishing_cloth_1) to clean it before placing it on the verification desk.
Have robot_1 and robot_2 cooperate to open the locked document safe (document_safe_1) in the document authentication room.
Move the sealed evidence crate (evidence_crate_1) to the secure briefing room.
Move the stainless-steel fume hood (fume_hood_1) to the storage logistics bay.
Cooperatively move the heavy-duty transport trolley (heavy_duty_trolley_1) to the forensic lab annex and use it to transport the lab refrigerator (refrigeration_unit_1) to the storage logistics bay.
Cooperatively move the sealed evidence drum (sealed_evidence_drum_1) to the forensic lab annex and use the UV light wand (uv_light_wand_1) to sterilize it.
